task:
Handle all three JavaScript dialog types on this page:
1. Click 'Click for JS Alert' — accept the alert dialog
2. Click 'Click for JS Confirm' — accept (OK) the confirmation dialog
3. Click 'Click for JS Prompt' — type 'Hello CDP' into the prompt text field and accept it
After each dialog interaction, verify the result message appears in the #result area at the bottom. The final result should show the text you typed in the prompt.
